paramInformation.label: Temp. Unit
paramInformation.description: Select temperature unit displayed/used by the thermostat.

paramInformation.label: Temp. Difference Reporting
paramInformation.description: Automatically report temperature to the gateway when the temperature variation exceeds this threshold. 0 = disabled. (Manual indicates usable range starts at 3 when enabled.)

paramInformation.label: Humidity Difference Reporting
paramInformation.description: Automatically report humidity to the gateway when the humidity variation exceeds this threshold (%). 0 = disabled.

paramInformation.label: Power Failure Memory
paramInformation.description: Restore previous status after power loss.

paramInformation.label: Temp. Upper Limit
paramInformation.description: Upper setpoint limit (depends on unit setting).

paramInformation.label: Temp. Lower Limit
paramInformation.description: Lower setpoint limit (depends on unit setting).

paramInformation.label: Temp. Offset
paramInformation.description: Temperature calibration offset. (Unit per manual; stored as signed value.)

paramInformation.label: Fan & Humidity Display Select
paramInformation.description: 0: Only display fan mode  1: Only display humidity  2: Only display fan mode and humidity  3: Display fan mode and humidity (when schedule is enabled, time/week and humidity share the same display).

paramInformation.label: Panel Lock
paramInformation.description: 0: Disabled  1: (Secret menu invalid)  2: Only mode and setpoint can be changed  3: All keys locked (except user can enter/exit inclusion/exclusion).

paramInformation.label: 1st Temp. Hysteresis
paramInformation.description: Stage 1 hysteresis. Manual shows Fahrenheit default as 2. Range shown as 3–90 depending on unit.

paramInformation.label: 2nd Temp. Hysteresis
paramInformation.description: Additional minimum temperature difference after stage 1 turns on before stage 2 is activated. (Manual shows 10(C) / 20(F).)

paramInformation.label: 3rd Temp. Hysteresis
paramInformation.description: Additional minimum temperature difference after stage 2 turns on before stage 3 is activated. (Manual shows 10(C) / 20(F).)

paramInformation.label: System Control Type
paramInformation.description: HVAC system type (see controlling type details in thermostat menu/manual).

options.label: O/B outputs ON in heat pump start heating; OFF in cooling
O/B outputs ON in heat pump start cooling; OFF in heating

paramInformation.label: Compressor Protection Time
paramInformation.description: Compressor delay time from shutdown to startup (minutes).

paramInformation.label: EM(AUX) Emergency Heat Mode
paramInformation.description: Emergency heat mode. 0: OFF  1: ON (Manual note: only valid for heat pump system with heating function.)

paramInformation.label: Time Display Selection
paramInformation.description: Time display when schedule is active: 0: Time, week, current time period  1: Only week and current time period  2: Time, week and current time period (manual lists these display modes).

paramInformation.label: Fan shutdown delay (min)
paramInformation.description: Fan continues running after compressor shutdown. 0: When compressor shuts down, fan also shuts down. 1–127: fan shuts down after N minutes.

paramInformation.label: Whether to enable electrical auxiliary heating
Set same value: 1st period time (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: 2-byte time encoding: Byte1 = hour (0–23), Byte2 = minute (0–59). Raw value = (hour<<8) + minute.

paramInformation.label: Set same value: 2nd period time (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: 2-byte time encoding: Byte1 = hour (0–23), Byte2 = minute (0–59). Raw value = (hour<<8) + minute.

paramInformation.label: Set same value: 3rd period time (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: 2-byte time encoding: Byte1 = hour (0–23), Byte2 = minute (0–59). Raw value = (hour<<8) + minute.

paramInformation.label: Set same value: 4th period time (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: 2-byte time encoding: Byte1 = hour (0–23), Byte2 = minute (0–59). Raw value = (hour<<8) + minute.

paramInformation.label: Heat setpoint: 1st period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Heat setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 21.0°C / 70.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Heat setpoint: 2nd period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Heat setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 16.5°C / 62.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Heat setpoint: 3rd period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Heat setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 21.0°C / 70.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Heat setpoint: 4th period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Heat setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 16.5°C / 62.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Cool setpoint: 1st period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Cool setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 25.5°C / 78.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Cool setpoint: 2nd period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Cool setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 29.5°C / 85.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Cool setpoint: 3rd period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Cool setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 25.5°C / 78.0°F.

paramInformation.label: Cool setpoint: 4th period (MON–SUN)
paramInformation.description: Cool setpoint (0.1° resolution). Default shown as 28.0°C / 82.0°F.
